privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.responsibleText: The operator of HackTheStudy is responsible for data processing on this website. Contact details can be found in the Legal Notice.
privacy.dataUsage: Usage data (e.g., learning progress, session information)
privacy.dataTechnical: Technical data (IP address, device type, browser information)
privacy.purposeIntro: We use the collected data for:
privacy.legalBasisText: Data processing is carried out in accordance with the Swiss Data Protection Act (DSG), in particular:
privacy.cookiesText: Our platform uses cookies and tracking technologies to improve the user experience. You can manage or disable cookies in your browser settings.
privacy.apiText: We use APIs for data processing and to provide personalized learning content. We pay attention to data protection and security.
privacy.paymentText: When using paid functions, payment data is processed via secure payment providers. We do not store complete credit card data on our servers.
privacy.rightsObjection: Right to object to the processing
privacy.rightsContact: To exercise your rights, please contact us via the email address provided in the Legal Notice.
privacy.securityText: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data. All data transfers are encrypted via HTTPS.
privacy.retentionText: Data is only stored for as long as necessary to provide our services or as required by law. You can have your data deleted at any time.
